answers.answer: Hi there!Well, without a clinical evaluation it would be difficult to determine the cause of your symptoms. Issues with urination could be related to infections, inflammations, neuro-muscular issues etc; while ejaculation issues could be caused due to psychological stress, performance anxiety, depression, neurogenic disorders peyronie's disease, body image issues, medications, alcohol, smoking, drugs/medications, hormonal imbalance, radiation therapy, kidney failure, metabolic disorders, multiple sclerosis, hypertension, diabetes, prostatitis, urethritis etc. I would suggest considering an evaluation by a primary care physician or a urologist for an accurate diagnosis and appropriate management.Hope this is helpful.Take care!

question: I'm a 44 yr old man. Having trouble peeing and now having trouble cuming when having sex? Very worried!
title: justthegirlfriendthatloveshim555
